title: Design pattern
content:
"* Why design pattern ?
- It make better code
- Become a better programmer

* Where is design pattern come from ?
Gang of four : published 1994

1 / Singleton
For handle multiple instance created. It may cause a lot of issue cause maybe we just want to attach to 1 instance only.

2 / Prototype
Using for handle if we want to recreate an object by cloning exist instance -> better way instead of try to create a new object and apply same data

3 / Factory
Using for handle create difference objects with difference logic for multiple case.

4 / Builder
Using for handle multiple argument for class => make it more clean and simple

5 / Adapter
Using to allow objects with incompatible interfaces to collaborate

6 / Proxy
It intercepts and controls access to the target object
